definitions.text: an event that accomplishes its intended purpose
examples: let's call heads a success and tails a failure
the election was a remarkable success for the Whigs
his success in the marathon was unexpected
his new play was a great success

definitions.text: a state of prosperity or fame
examples: he does not consider wealth synonymous with success

definitions.text: a person with a record of successes
examples: his son would never be the achiever that his father was
if you want to be a success you have to dress like a success
